alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 21 at 2:36AM MST until February 23 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH EARLY WEDNESDAY EVENING ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Periods of heavy snow possible above 5000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches above 5000 feet and 8 to 16 inches above 7000 feet. Southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts from 35 to 45 mph. * WHERE...The Mogollon Rim above 5000 feet. * WHEN...From late Tuesday afternoon through early Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible at times. Areas of blowing and drifting snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow forecast from 5 PM Tuesday to 6 PM Wednesday: Doney Park 7 to 11 inches Flagstaff 10 to 16 inches Forest Lakes 10 to 16 inches Heber-Overgaard 5 to 9 inches Williams 8 to 12 inches.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim
